title: Strengthening Business Strategy Practical Competencies: Web-Based Learning Environment to Enhance Science Learning Motivation

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Through inquiry-based tasks in web-based learning environments, learners increase curiosity about scientific phenomena by ≥30%.

Within one week, learners apply ≥3 self-directed learning strategies (e.g., online research, peer feedback requests, benchmarking cases) to propose solutions for two real-world work problems, achieving ≥3.0 points (4-point scale) in team leader evaluations (problem definition clarity, execution plan specificity).

After a one-week intensive course, learners achieve ≥3.8 average on perceived learning control and ≥4.0 on challenge awareness (both 5-point scales) in a motivation survey, showing ≥15% improvement from pre-assessment scores.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
